result.markdown: --- title: "" --- ## Week 7 ### Day 1 #### [Today]{style="color:red;"} - Student-led paper discussion - Lecture (Code): Bayesian Hierarchical Model Files - Install R packages: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # CRAN packages install.packages(c("brms","bayesplot")) ``` ::: #### [Assigned]{style="color:red;"} - Readings for next class: - Gerber et al. 2014 - Background Reading (not required): - [Kurz, 2023; Doing Bayesian Data Analysis in brms and the tidyverse](https://bookdown.org/content/3686/) ### Day 2 (lab) #### [Today]{style="color:red;"} - Discuss Project - Lecture: Board Work - Downloads: Files - Install R packages: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # CRAN packages install.packages(c("ubms")) ``` ::: #### [Assigned]{style="color:red;"}
